1.Name: The Dark Knight
1.Outline: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the caped crusader must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.
1.Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

2.Name: Airlift
2.Outline: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August, 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.
2.Credit: Dir: Raja Menon With: Akshay Kumar, Nimrat Kaur, Taranjit Kaur

3.Name: Inception
3.Outline: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
3.Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page

4.Name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
4.Outline: After the rebels have been brutally overpowered by the Empire on their newly established base, Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training with Master Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.
4.Credit: Dir: Irvin Kershner With: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

5.Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
5.Outline: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
5.Credit: Dir: Peter Jackson With: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen

6.Name: The Matrix
6.Outline: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
6.Credit: Dir: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski With: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

7.Name: Vishwaroopam
7.Outline: Vishwanathan, a Kathak dance teacher in New York, is in a rather happy marriage with Nirupama who is a nuclear oncologist...
7.Credit: Dir: Kamal Haasan With: Pooja Kumar, Miles Anderson, Kamal Haasan

8.Name: Star Wars
8.Outline: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.
8.Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

9.Outline: A rock star must overcome his psychological inhibitions to seek revenge for his parents' death.
9.Credit: Dir: Sukumar With: Mahesh Babu, Kriti Sanon, Nasser

10.Name: Baahubali: The Beginning
10.Outline: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades old feud between two warring people.
10.Credit: Dir: S.S. Rajamouli With: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Anushka Shetty

11.Name: Saving Private Ryan
11.Outline: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
11.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore

12.Name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
12.Outline: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.
12.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman

13.Name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
13.Outline: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her young son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg, made out of liquid metal.
13.Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong

14.Name: Gladiator
14.Outline: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.
14.Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen

15.Name: Waar
15.Outline: The efforts of the Pakistani security forces in their fight against terrorism and how the lives of security officials are affected. A retired security officer returns to save Pakistan from a major terrorist attack.
15.Credit: Dir: Bilal Lashari With: Shaan Shahid, Hamza Abbasi, Shamoon Abbasi

16.Name: The Dark Knight Rises
16.Outline: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, the Dark Knight, with the help of the enigmatic Selina, is forced from his imposed exile to save Gotham City, now on the edge of total annihilation, from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
16.Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway

17.Name: Sholay
17.Outline: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture him.
17.Credit: Dir: Ramesh Sippy With: Dharmendra, Sanjeev Kumar, Hema Malini
17.Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Drama | Musical | Thriller

18.Name: Aliens
18.Outline: The planet from Alien has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?
18.Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Carrie Henn

19.Name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
19.Outline: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to make Vader return from the dark side of the Force.
19.Credit: Dir: Richard Marquand With: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

20.Name: Deadpool
20.Outline: A former Special Forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopting the alter ego Deadpool.
20.Credit: Dir: Tim Miller With: Ryan Reynolds, Morena Baccarin, T.J. Miller

21.Name: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
21.Outline: The truth behind the ascension of Milkha "The Flying Sikh" Singh who was scarred because of the India-Pakistan partition.
21.Credit: Dir: Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra With: Farhan Akhtar, Sonam Kapoor, Pavan Malhotra

22.Name: Gangs of Wasseypur
22.Outline: A clash between Sultan (a Qureishi dacoit chief) and Shahid Khan (a Pathan who impersonates him) leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.
22.Credit: Dir: Anurag Kashyap With: Manoj Bajpayee, Richa Chadha, Nawazuddin Siddiqui

23.Name: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
23.Outline: Three decades after the defeat of the Galactic Empire, a new threat arises. The First Order attempts to rule the galaxy and only a ragtag group of heroes can stop them, along with the help of the Resistance.
23.Credit: Dir: J.J. Abrams With: Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Oscar Isaac

24.Name: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
24.Outline: Fred Dobbs and Bob Curtin, two Americans searching for work in Mexico, convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.
24.Credit: Dir: John Huston With: Humphrey Bogart, Walter Huston, Tim Holt

25.Name: Haider
25.Outline: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle - the man he suspects to have a role in his father's fate.
25.Credit: Dir: Vishal Bhardwaj With: Shahid Kapoor, Tabu, Shraddha Kapoor

26.Name: Batman Begins
26.Outline: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his war on crime to free the crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption that the Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.
26.Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Ken Watanabe

27.Name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
27.Outline: When Dr. Henry Jones Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Indiana Jones must follow in his father's footsteps and stop the Nazis.
27.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Harrison Ford, Sean Connery, Alison Doody

28.Name: Ran
28.Outline: An elderly lord abdicates to his three sons, and the two corrupt ones turn against him.
28.Credit: Dir: Akira Kurosawa With: Tatsuya Nakadai, Akira Terao, Jinpachi Nezu

29.Name: The General
29.Outline: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.
29.Credit: Dir: Clyde Bruckman, Buster Keaton With: Buster Keaton, Marion Mack, Glen Cavender

30.Name: Heat
30.Outline: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.
30.Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Val Kilmer

31.Name: Die Hard
31.Outline: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save his wife Holly Gennaro and several others that were taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.
31.Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia

32.Name: V for Vendetta
32.Outline: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.
32.Credit: Dir: James McTeigue With: Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman, Rupert Graves

33.Name: Baby
33.Outline: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.
33.Credit: Dir: Neeraj Pandey With: Danny Denzongpa, Rana Daggubati, Akshay Kumar

34.Name: Rush
34.Outline: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda .
34.Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Daniel BrÃ¼hl, Chris Hemsworth, Olivia Wilde

35.Name: Tae Guk Gi: The Brotherhood of War
35.Outline: A drama about the fate of brothers forced to fight in the Korean War.
35.Credit: Dir: Je-kyu Kang With: Dong-gun Jang, Bin Won, Eun-ju Lee

36.Name: Mad Max: Fury Road
36.Outline: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.
36.Credit: Dir: George Miller With: Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult

37.Name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
37.Outline: The Bride wakens from a four-year coma. The child she carried in her womb is gone. Now she must wreak vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her - a team she was once part of.
37.Credit: Dir: Quentin Tarantino With: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah

38.Name: The Avengers
38.Outline: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
38.Credit: Dir: Joss Whedon With: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson

39.Name: Elite Squad: The Enemy Within
39.Outline: After a prison riot, former-Captain Nascimento, now a high ranking security officer in Rio de Janeiro, is swept into a bloody political dispute that involves government officials and paramilitary groups.
39.Credit: Dir: JosÃ© Padilha With: Wagner Moura, Irandhir Santos, AndrÃ© Ramiro

40.Name: The Bourne Ultimatum
40.Outline: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless CIA official and his agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.
40.Credit: Dir: Paul Greengrass With: Matt Damon, Edgar Ramirez, Joan Allen

41.Name: Ip Man
41.Outline: A semi-biographical account of Yip Man, the successful martial arts master who taught the Chinese martial art of Wing Chun to the world.
41.Credit: Dir: Wilson Yip With: Donnie Yen, Simon Yam, Siu-Wong Fan

42.Name: Guardians of the Galaxy
42.Outline: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.
42.Credit: Dir: James Gunn With: Chris Pratt, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper

43.Name: Elite Squad
43.Outline: 1997, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his occupation while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope comes to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
43.Credit: Dir: JosÃ© Padilha With: Wagner Moura, AndrÃ© Ramiro, Caio Junqueira

44.Name: Akira
44.Outline: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two kids and a group of psychics can stop.
44.Credit: Dir: Katsuhiro Ãtomo With: Nozomu Sasaki, Mami Koyama, Mitsuo Iwata

45.Name: The Terminator
45.Outline: A human-looking indestructible cyborg is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.
45.Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn

46.Name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
46.Outline: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
46.Credit: Dir: Gore Verbinski With: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom

47.Name: Rio Bravo
47.Outline: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a cripple, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.
47.Credit: Dir: Howard Hawks With: John Wayne, Dean Martin, Ricky Nelson

48.Name: A Fistful of Dollars
48.Outline: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.
48.Credit: Dir: Sergio Leone With: Clint Eastwood, Gian Maria VolontÃ¨, Marianne Koch

49.Name: X-Men: Days of Future Past
49.Outline: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.
49.Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Hugh Jackman

50.Name: The Wild Bunch
50.Outline: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.
50.Credit: Dir: Sam Peckinpah With: William Holden, Ernest Borgnine, Robert Ryan

51.Name: The Raid 2
51.Outline: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.
51.Credit: Dir: Gareth Evans With: Iko Uwais, Yayan Ruhian, Arifin Putra

52.Name: Star Trek
52.Outline: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Commander Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful, time-traveling Romulan creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.
52.Credit: Dir: J.J. Abrams With: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Simon Pegg

53.Name: The Adventures of Robin Hood
53.Outline: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a rebel guerrilla army.
53.Credit: Dir: Michael Curtiz, William Keighley With: Errol Flynn, Olivia de Havilland, Basil Rathbone

54.Name: Ghost in the Shell
54.Outline: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.
54.Credit: Dir: Mamoru Oshii With: Atsuko Tanaka, Iemasa Kayumi, Akio Ãtsuka

55.Name: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
55.Outline: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.
55.Credit: Dir: Quentin Tarantino With: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Michael Madsen

56.Name: The Iron Giant
56.Outline: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.
56.Credit: Dir: Brad Bird With: Eli Marienthal, Harry Connick Jr., Jennifer Aniston
56.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Drama | Family | Sci-Fi

57.Name: Casino Royale
57.Outline: Armed with a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007 and must defeat a weapons dealer in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, but things are not what they seem.
57.Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Judi Dench

58.Name: District 9
58.Outline: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly finds a kindred spirit in a government agent who is exposed to their biotechnology.
58.Credit: Dir: Neill Blomkamp With: Sharlto Copley, David James, Jason Cope

59.Name: The Incredibles
59.Outline: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.
59.Credit: Dir: Brad Bird With: Craig T. Nelson, Samuel L. Jackson, Holly Hunter

60.Name: Serenity
60.Outline: The crew of the ship Serenity tries to evade an assassin sent to recapture one of their number who is telepathic.
60.Credit: Dir: Joss Whedon With: Nathan Fillion, Gina Torres, Chiwetel Ejiofor

61.Name: True Romance
61.Outline: Clarence marries hooker Alabama, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood, while the owners of the coke try to reclaim it.
61.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Christian Slater, Patricia Arquette, Dennis Hopper

62.Name: The Blues Brothers
62.Outline: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.
62.Credit: Dir: John Landis With: John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, Cab Calloway

63.Name: Hero
63.Outline: A defense officer, Nameless, was summoned by the King of Qin regarding his success of terminating three warriors.
63.Credit: Dir: Yimou Zhang With: Jet Li, Tony Chiu Wai Leung, Maggie Cheung

64.Name: The Bourne Identity
64.Outline: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and regain his memory.
64.Credit: Dir: Doug Liman With: Franka Potente, Matt Damon, Chris Cooper

65.Name: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
65.Outline: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.
65.Credit: Dir: ShinichirÃ´ Watanabe With: Beau Billingslea, Melissa Fahn, Nicholas Guest
65.Genre: Animation | Action | Crime | Drama | Sci-Fi | Thriller

66.Name: Edge of Tomorrow
66.Outline: A military officer is brought into an alien war against an extraterrestrial enemy who can reset the day and know the future. When this officer is enabled with the same power, he teams up with a Special Forces warrior to try and end the war.
66.Credit: Dir: Doug Liman With: Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt, Bill Paxton

67.Name: Ninja Scroll
67.Outline: A mysterious vagabond sets out on a journey to confront his past. Little does he know he is up against a demonic force of killers, with a ghost from his past as the leader.
67.Credit: Dir: Yoshiaki Kawajiri, Kevin Seymour With: Stephen Apostolina, Dean Wein, Wendee Lee

68.Name: The Killer
68.Outline: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded, only to be double-crossed by his boss.
68.Credit: Dir: John Woo With: Yun-Fat Chow, Danny Lee, Sally Yeh

69.Name: Hard Boiled
69.Outline: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.
69.Credit: Dir: John Woo With: Yun-Fat Chow, Tony Chiu Wai Leung, Teresa Mo

70.Name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
70.Outline: Two warriors in pursuit of a stolen sword and a notorious fugitive are led to an impetuous, physically skilled, adolescent nobleman's daughter, who is at a crossroads in her life.
70.Credit: Dir: Ang Lee With: Yun-Fat Chow, Michelle Yeoh, Ziyi Zhang

71.Name: Iron Man
71.Outline: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, an engineer creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.
71.Credit: Dir: Jon Favreau With: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard

72.Name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
72.Outline: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.
72.Credit: Dir: Dean DeBlois With: Jay Baruchel, Cate Blanchett, Gerard Butler
72.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy

73.Name: The Boondock Saints
73.Outline: Fraternal twins set out to rid Boston of the evil men operating there while being tracked down by an FBI agent.
73.Credit: Dir: Troy Duffy With: Willem Dafoe, Sean Patrick Flanery, Norman Reedus

74.Name: Avatar
74.Outline: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
74.Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver

75.Name: Big Hero 6
75.Outline: The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.
75.Credit: Dir: Don Hall, Chris Williams With: Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit, Jamie Chung
75.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Sci-Fi

76.Name: The Man from Nowhere
76.Outline: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.
76.Credit: Dir: Jeong-beom Lee With: Bin Won, Sae-ron Kim, Tae-hoon Kim

77.Name: Hot Fuzz
77.Outline: Exceptional London cop Nicholas Angel is involuntarily transferred to a quaint English village and paired with a witless new partner. While on the beat, Nicholas suspects a sinister conspiracy is afoot with the residents.
77.Credit: Dir: Edgar Wright With: Simon Pegg, Nick Frost, Martin Freeman

78.Name: Taken
78.Outline: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.
78.Credit: Dir: Pierre Morel With: Liam Neeson, Maggie Grace, Famke Janssen

79.Name: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
79.Outline: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.
79.Credit: Dir: Eric Radomski, Bruce W. Timm With: Kevin Conroy, Dana Delany, Hart Bochner
79.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Crime | Drama | Family | Mystery | Romance | Sci-Fi | Thriller

80.Name: Tombstone
80.Outline: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.
80.Credit: Dir: George P. Cosmatos With: Kurt Russell, Val Kilmer, Sam Elliott
80.Genre: Action | Biography | Drama | History | Romance | Western

81.Name: Predator
81.Outline: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extra-terrestrial warrior.
81.Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Carl Weathers, Kevin Peter Hall

82.Name: The Magnificent Seven
82.Outline: An oppressed Mexican peasant village assembles seven gunfighters to help defend their homes.
82.Credit: Dir: John Sturges With: Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson

83.Name: Apocalypto
83.Outline: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, the rulers insist the key to prosperity is to build more temples and offer human sacrifices. Jaguar Paw, a young man captured for sacrifice, flees to avoid his fate.
83.Credit: Dir: Mel Gibson With: Gerardo Taracena, Raoul Max Trujillo, Dalia HernÃ¡ndez

84.Name: Star Trek Into Darkness
84.Outline: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.
84.Credit: Dir: J.J. Abrams With: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Zoe Saldana

85.Name: Dirty Harry
85.Outline: When a mad man calling himself 'the Scorpio Killer' menaces the city, tough as nails San Francisco Police Inspector Harry Callahan is assigned to track down and ferret out the crazed psychopath.
85.Credit: Dir: Don Siegel With: Clint Eastwood, Andrew Robinson, Harry Guardino

86.Name: The Last of the Mohicans
86.Outline: Three trappers protect a British Colonel's daughters in the midst of the French and Indian War.
86.Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: Daniel Day-Lewis, Madeleine Stowe, Russell Means

87.Name: The French Connection
87.Outline: A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.
87.Credit: Dir: William Friedkin With: Gene Hackman, Roy Scheider, Fernando Rey

88.Name: The Dirty Dozen
88.Outline: A US Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers in World War II.
88.Credit: Dir: Robert Aldrich With: Lee Marvin, Ernest Borgnine, Charles Bronson

89.Name: The Lego Movie
89.Outline: An ordinary Lego construction worker, thought to be the prophesied 'Special', is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the Lego universe into eternal stasis.
89.Credit: Dir: Phil Lord, Christopher Miller With: Chris Pratt, Will Ferrell, Elizabeth Banks
89.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy

90.Name: The Fugitive
90.Outline: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt.
90.Credit: Dir: Andrew Davis With: Harrison Ford, Tommy Lee Jones, Sela Ward
90.Genre: Action | Adventure | Crime | Drama | Mystery | Thriller

91.Name: The Longest Day
91.Outline: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.
91.Credit: Dir: Ken Annakin, Andrew Marton With: John Wayne, Robert Ryan, Richard Burton

92.Name: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
92.Outline: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and Shield agent, the Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.
92.Credit: Dir: Anthony Russo, Joe Russo With: Chris Evans, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson

93.Name: X-Men: First Class
93.Outline: In 1962, the United States government enlists the help of Mutants with superhuman abilities to stop a malicious dictator who is determined to start World War III.
93.Credit: Dir: Matthew Vaughn With: James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence

94.Name: Kung Fu Hustle
94.Outline: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.
94.Credit: Dir: Stephen Chow With: Stephen Chow, Wah Yuen, Qiu Yuen

95.Name: Skyfall
95.Outline: Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. Whilst MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.
95.Credit: Dir: Sam Mendes With: Daniel Craig, Javier Bardem, Naomie Harris

96.Name: The Bourne Supremacy
96.Outline: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.
96.Credit: Dir: Paul Greengrass With: Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Joan Allen

97.Name: Kingsman: The Secret Service
97.Outline: A spy organization recruits an unrefined, but promising street kid into the agency's ultra-competitive training program, just as a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.
97.Credit: Dir: Matthew Vaughn With: Colin Firth, Taron Egerton, Samuel L. Jackson

98.Name: Goldfinger
98.Outline: Investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.
98.Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Sean Connery, Gert FrÃ¶be, Honor Blackman

99.Name: Man on Fire
99.Outline: In Mexico City, a former assassin swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.
99.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Denzel Washington, Christopher Walken, Dakota Fanning

100.Name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
100.Outline: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.
100.Credit: Dir: Nicholas Meyer With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley

101.Name: The Count of Monte Cristo
101.Outline: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend," escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.
101.Credit: Dir: Kevin Reynolds With: Jim Caviezel, Guy Pearce, Richard Harris

102.Outline: King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.
102.Credit: Dir: Zack Snyder With: Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, David Wenham

103.Name: Dark City
103.Outline: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.
103.Credit: Dir: Alex Proyas With: Rufus Sewell, Kiefer Sutherland, Jennifer Connelly
103.Genre: Action | Drama | Fantasy | Mystery | Sci-Fi | Thriller

104.Name: The Last Samurai
104.Outline: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.
104.Credit: Dir: Edward Zwick With: Tom Cruise, Ken Watanabe, Billy Connolly

105.Name: Enter the Dragon
105.Outline: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover.
105.Credit: Dir: Robert Clouse With: Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly

106.Name: Kick-Ass
106.Outline: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a super-hero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.
106.Credit: Dir: Matthew Vaughn With: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Nicolas Cage, ChloÃ« Grace Moretz

107.Name: Forbidden Planet
107.Outline: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.
107.Credit: Dir: Fred M. Wilcox With: Walter Pidgeon, Anne Francis, Leslie Nielsen

108.Name: Where Eagles Dare
108.Outline: Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding an American General prisoner... but that's not all that's really going on.
108.Credit: Dir: Brian G. Hutton With: Richard Burton, Clint Eastwood, Mary Ure

109.Name: The Warriors
109.Outline: In 1979, a charismatic leader summons the street gangs of New York City in a bid to take it over. When he is killed, The Warriors are falsely blamed and now must fight their way home while every other gang is hunting them down to kill them.
109.Credit: Dir: Walter Hill With: Michael Beck, James Remar, Dorsey Wright

110.Name: Fearless
110.Outline: A biography of Chinese Martial Arts Master Huo Yuanjia, who is the founder and spiritual guru of the Jin Wu Sports Federation.
110.Credit: Dir: Ronny Yu With: Jet Li, Li Sun, Yong Dong

111.Name: Sicario
111.Outline: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.
111.Credit: Dir: Denis Villeneuve With: Emily Blunt, Josh Brolin, Benicio Del Toro

112.Name: Cell 211
112.Outline: The story of two men on different sides of a prison riot -- the inmate leading the rebellion and the young guard trapped in the revolt, who poses as a prisoner in a desperate attempt to survive the ordeal.
112.Credit: Dir: Daniel MonzÃ³n With: Luis Tosar, Alberto Ammann, Antonio Resines

113.Name: First Blood
113.Outline: Former Green Beret John Rambo is pursued into the mountains surrounding a small town by a tyrannical sheriff and his deputies, forcing him to survive using his combat skills.
113.Credit: Dir: Ted Kotcheff With: Sylvester Stallone, Brian Dennehy, Richard Crenna

114.Name: Minority Report
114.Outline: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.
114.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton

115.Name: The Fifth Element
115.Outline: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr Zorg at bay.
115.Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, Gary Oldman

116.Name: Watchmen
116.Outline: In an alternate 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.
116.Credit: Dir: Zack Snyder With: Jackie Earle Haley, Patrick Wilson, Carla Gugino

117.Name: The Big Blue
117.Outline: Enzo and Jacques have known each other for a long time. Their friendship started in their childhood days in the Mediterranean...
117.Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Jean-Marc Barr, Jean Reno, Rosanna Arquette

118.Name: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
118.Outline: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline rich, community escape a band of bandits.
118.Credit: Dir: George Miller With: Mel Gibson, Bruce Spence, Michael Preston

119.Name: Grindhouse
119.Outline: Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez's homage to drive-in double features in the 60s and 70s with two back-to-back cult films that include previews of coming attractions between them.
119.Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez, Eli Roth With: Kurt Russell, Rose McGowan, Danny Trejo

120.Name: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
120.Outline: A growing nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier.
120.Credit: Dir: Matt Reeves With: Gary Oldman, Keri Russell, Andy Serkis

121.Name: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
121.Outline: During the near end of the clone wars, Darth Sidious has revealed himself and is ready to execute the last part of his plan to rule the Galaxy...
121.Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman, Ewan McGregor

122.Name: Lethal Weapon
122.Outline: A veteran cop, Murtaugh, is partnered with a young suicidal cop, Riggs. Both having one thing in common; hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.
122.Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey

123.Name: Sherlock Holmes
123.Outline: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.
123.Credit: Dir: Guy Ritchie With: Robert Downey Jr., Jude Law, Rachel McAdams

124.Name: The Legend of Drunken Master
124.Outline: A young martial artist is caught between respecting his pacifist father's wishes or stopping a group of disrespectful foreigners from stealing precious artifacts.
124.Credit: Dir: Chia-Liang Liu With: Jackie Chan, Ho-Sung Pak, Lung Ti

125.Name: United 93
125.Outline: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on September eleventh, 2001, that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.
125.Credit: Dir: Paul Greengrass With: David Alan Basche, Olivia Thirlby, Liza ColÃ³n-Zayas

126.Name: The Raid: Redemption
126.Outline: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.
126.Credit: Dir: Gareth Evans With: Iko Uwais, Ananda George, Ray Sahetapy

127.Name: The Crow
127.Outline: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancÃ©e's murder.
127.Credit: Dir: Alex Proyas With: Brandon Lee, Michael Wincott, Rochelle Davis

128.Name: The Hunt for Red October
128.Outline: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?
128.Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin, Scott Glenn

129.Name: 13 Assassins
129.Outline: A group of assassins come together for a suicide mission to kill an evil lord.
129.Credit: Dir: Takashi Miike With: KÃ´ji Yakusho, Takayuki Yamada, YÃ»suke Iseya

130.Name: Zatoichi
130.Outline: The blind masseur/swordsman comes to a town in control of warring gangs, and while bunking with a farming family, he meets two women with their own agenda.
130.Credit: Dir: Takeshi Kitano With: Takeshi Kitano, Tadanobu Asano, Yui Natsukawa

131.Name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
131.Outline: A skirmish in Shanghai puts archaeologist Indiana Jones, his partner Short Round and singer Willie Scott crossing paths with an Indian village desperate to reclaim a rock stolen by a secret cult beneath the catacombs of an ancient palace.
131.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Harrison Ford, Kate Capshaw, Jonathan Ke Quan

132.Name: Kung Fu Panda
132.Outline: In the Valley of Peace, Po the Panda finds himself chosen as the Dragon Warrior despite the fact that he is obese and a complete novice at martial arts.
132.Credit: Dir: Mark Osborne, John Stevenson With: Jack Black, Ian McShane, Angelina Jolie

133.Name: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
133.Outline: The dying words of a thief spark a madcap cross-country rush to find some treasure.
133.Credit: Dir: Stanley Kramer With: Spencer Tracy, Milton Berle, Ethel Merman

134.Name: Fury
134.Outline: April, 1945. As the Allies make their final push in the European Theatre, a battle-hardened Army sergeant named Wardaddy commands a Sherman tank and his five-man crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Outnumbered, out-gunned, and with a rookie soldier thrust into their platoon, Wardaddy and his men face overwhelming odds in their heroic attempts to strike at the heart of Nazi Germany.
134.Credit: Dir: David Ayer With: Brad Pitt, Shia LaBeouf, Logan Lerman

135.Name: The Guns of Navarone
135.Outline: A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.
135.Credit: Dir: J. Lee Thompson With: David Niven, Gregory Peck, Anthony Quinn

136.Name: Ip Man 2
136.Outline: Centering on Ip Man's migration to Hong Kong in 1949 as he attempts to propagate his discipline of Wing Chun martial arts.
136.Credit: Dir: Wilson Yip With: Donnie Yen, Xiaoming Huang, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung

137.Name: Mesrine Part 1: Killer Instinct
137.Outline: The story of french gangster Jacques Mesrine, before he was called Public Enemy NÂ°1.
137.Credit: Dir: Jean-FranÃ§ois Richet With: Vincent Cassel, CÃ©cile De France, GÃ©rard Depardieu

138.Name: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
138.Outline: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.
138.Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Bruce Willis, Jeremy Irons, Samuel L. Jackson

139.Name: Midnight Run
139.Outline: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the FBI, and the Mafia after jumping bail.
139.Credit: Dir: Martin Brest With: Robert De Niro, Charles Grodin, Yaphet Kotto

140.Name: Lone Survivor
140.Outline: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.
140.Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Mark Wahlberg, Taylor Kitsch, Emile Hirsch

141.Name: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
141.Outline: A substance, designed to help the brain repair itself, gives rise to a super-intelligent chimp who leads an ape uprising.
141.Credit: Dir: Rupert Wyatt With: James Franco, Andy Serkis, Freida Pinto

142.Name: Batman
142.Outline: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.
142.Credit: Dir: Tim Burton With: Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger

143.Name: House of Flying Daggers
143.Outline: A romantic police captain breaks a beautiful member of a rebel group out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.
143.Credit: Dir: Yimou Zhang With: Ziyi Zhang, Takeshi Kaneshiro, Andy Lau

144.Name: Star Trek: First Contact
144.Outline: The Borg go back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.
144.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Frakes With: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner

145.Name: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
145.Outline: An African American mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.
145.Credit: Dir: Jim Jarmusch With: Forest Whitaker, Henry Silva, John Tormey

146.Name: RoboCop
146.Outline: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.
146.Credit: Dir: Paul Verhoeven With: Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Dan O'Herlihy

147.Name: Avengers: Age of Ultron
147.Outline: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's Mightiest Heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plans.
147.Credit: Dir: Joss Whedon With: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo

148.Name: Equilibrium
148.Outline: In a Fascist future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system.
148.Credit: Dir: Kurt Wimmer With: Christian Bale, Sean Bean, Emily Watson

149.Name: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
149.Outline: Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.
149.Credit: Dir: Edgar Wright With: Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Kieran Culkin

150.Name: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
150.Outline: Sherlock Holmes and his sidekick Dr. Watson join forces to outwit and bring down their fiercest adversary, Professor Moriarty.
150.Credit: Dir: Guy Ritchie With: Robert Downey Jr., Jude Law, Jared Harris

151.Name: Undisputed 3: Redemption
151.Outline: Boyka is back. This time he is fighting in the first ever inter-prison tournament with one knee.
151.Credit: Dir: Isaac Florentine With: Scott Adkins, Mykel Shannon Jenkins, Mark Ivanir

152.Name: Total Recall
152.Outline: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?
152.Credit: Dir: Paul Verhoeven With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sharon Stone, Michael Ironside

153.Name: X2
153.Outline: The X-Men band together to find a mutant assassin who has made an attempt on the President's life, while the Mutant Academy is attacked by military forces.
153.Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry

154.Name: Southpaw
154.Outline: Boxer Billy Hope turns to trainer Tick Wills to help him get his life back on track after losing his wife in a tragic accident and his daughter to child protection services.
154.Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Jake Gyllenhaal, Rachel McAdams, Oona Laurence

155.Name: From Russia with Love
155.Outline: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination ploy involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by SPECTRE.
155.Credit: Dir: Terence Young With: Sean Connery, Robert Shaw, Lotte Lenya

156.Name: Bullitt
156.Outline: An all guts, no glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.
156.Credit: Dir: Peter Yates With: Steve McQueen, Jacqueline Bisset, Robert Vaughn

157.Name: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
157.Outline: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.
157.Credit: Dir: Christopher McQuarrie With: Tom Cruise, Rebecca Ferguson, Jeremy Renner

158.Name: Running Scared
158.Outline: A low-ranking thug is entrusted by his crime boss to dispose of a gun that killed corrupt cops, but things get out of control when the gun ends up in wrong hands.
158.Credit: Dir: Wayne Kramer With: Paul Walker, Cameron Bright, Chazz Palminteri

159.Name: Looper
159.Outline: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.
159.Credit: Dir: Rian Johnson With: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Bruce Willis, Emily Blunt

160.Name: X-Men
160.Outline: Two mutants come to a private academy for their kind whose resident superhero team must oppose a terrorist organization with similar powers.
160.Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen

161.Name: The Rock
161.Outline: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.
161.Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage, Ed Harris

162.Name: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
162.Outline: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.
162.Credit: Dir: Peter Weir With: Russell Crowe, Paul Bettany, Billy Boyd

163.Name: Red Cliff
163.Outline: The first chapter of a two-part story centered on a battle fought in China's Three Kingdoms period (220-280 A.D.).
163.Credit: Dir: John Woo With: Tony Chiu Wai Leung, Takeshi Kaneshiro, Fengyi Zhang

164.Name: Kung Fu Panda 3
164.Outline: Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness", Po must face two hugely epic, but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to his home.
164.Credit: Dir: Alessandro Carloni, Jennifer Yuh Nelson With: Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Dustin Hoffman

165.Name: Ant-Man
165.Outline: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.
165.Credit: Dir: Peyton Reed With: Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas, Corey Stoll

166.Name: Black Dynamite
166.Outline: Black Dynamite is the greatest African-American action star of the 1970s. When his only brother is killed by The Man it's up to him to find justice.
166.Credit: Dir: Scott Sanders With: Arsenio Hall, Tommy Davidson, Phyllis Applegate

167.Name: La Femme Nikita
167.Outline: Convicted felon Nikita, instead of going to jail, is given a new identity and trained, stylishly, as a top secret spy/assassin.
167.Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Anne Parillaud, Marc Duret, Patrick Fontana

168.Name: Assault on Precinct 13
168.Outline: The isolated inhabitants of an abandoned police station are under attack by the overwhelming numbers of a seemingly unstoppable street gang.
168.Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: Austin Stoker, Darwin Joston, Laurie Zimmer

169.Name: The Baader Meinhof Complex
169.Outline: A look at Germany's terrorist group, The Red Army Faction (RAF), which organized bombings, robberies, kidnappings and assassinations in the late 1960s and '70s.
169.Credit: Dir: Uli Edel With: Martina Gedeck, Moritz Bleibtreu, Johanna Wokalek

170.Name: Conquest 1453
170.Outline: After the death of his father Murat II, Mehmet II ascends to the Ottoman throne. After braving internal and external enemies, he decides to complete what he was destined to do - conquer Constantinople.
170.Credit: Dir: Faruk Aksoy With: Devrim Evin, Ibrahim Celikkol, Dilek Serbest

171.Name: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
171.Outline: An ex-mercenary is forced out of isolation when three mysterious men kidnap and brainwash the city's children afflicted with the Geostigma disease.
171.Credit: Dir: Tetsuya Nomura, Takeshi Nozue With: Takahiro Sakurai, Ayumi ItÃ´, Shotaro Morikubo
171.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller

172.Name: The Animatrix
172.Outline: The Animatrix is a collection of several animated short films, detailing the backstory of the "Matrix" universe, and the original war between man and machines which led to the creation of the Matrix.
172.Credit: Dir: Peter Chung, Andrew R. Jones With: Clayton Watson, Akio Ãtsuka, Pamela Adlon

173.Name: The Italian Job
173.Outline: Comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.
173.Credit: Dir: Peter Collinson With: Michael Caine, NoÃ«l Coward, Benny Hill

174.Name: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
174.Outline: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.
174.Credit: Dir: Brad Bird With: Tom Cruise, Jeremy Renner, Simon Pegg

175.Name: The Adventures of Tintin
175.Outline: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.
175.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis, Daniel Craig

176.Name: Fast Five
176.Outline: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.
176.Credit: Dir: Justin Lin With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson

177.Name: Superman
177.Outline: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.
177.Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Christopher Reeve, Margot Kidder, Gene Hackman

178.Name: The Good, the Bad, the Weird
178.Outline: The story of two outlaws and a bounty hunter in 1940s Manchuria and their rivalry to possess a treasure map while being pursued by the Japanese army and Chinese bandits.
178.Credit: Dir: Jee-woon Kim With: Kang-ho Song, Byung-hun Lee, Woo-sung Jung

179.Name: The Transformers: The Movie
179.Outline: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.
179.Credit: Dir: Nelson Shin With: Orson Welles, Robert Stack, Leonard Nimoy

180.Name: Ghajini
180.Outline: A short-term memory loss patient sets out on his journey to avenge the death of his beloved girl.
180.Credit: Dir: A.R. Murugadoss With: Aamir Khan, Asin, Jiah Khan

181.Name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
181.Outline: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.
181.Credit: Dir: Gore Verbinski With: Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley

182.Name: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
182.Outline: In the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin participate in a joint mission against a mysterious criminal organization, which is working to proliferate nuclear weapons.
182.Credit: Dir: Guy Ritchie With: Henry Cavill, Armie Hammer, Alicia Vikander

183.Name: Beverly Hills Cop
183.Outline: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.
183.Credit: Dir: Martin Brest With: Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, John Ashton

184.Name: RocknRolla
184.Outline: In London, a real-estate scam puts millions of pounds up for grabs, attracting some of the city's scrappiest tough guys and its more established underworld types, all of whom are looking to get rich quick. While the city's seasoned criminals vie for the cash, an unexpected player -- a drugged out rock 'n' roller presumed to be dead but very much alive -- has a multi-million dollar prize fall into his hands.
184.Credit: Dir: Guy Ritchie With: Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson, Idris Elba

185.Name: American Sniper
185.Outline: Navy S.E.A.L. sniper Chris Kyle's pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives on the battlefield and turns him into a legend. Back home to his wife and kids after four tours of duty, however, Chris finds that it is the war he can't leave behind.
185.Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller, Kyle Gallner
185.Genre: Action | Biography | Drama | History | Thriller | War

186.Name: Spider-Man 2
186.Outline: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.
186.Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina

187.Name: Big Trouble in Little China
187.Outline: An All-American trucker gets dragged into a centuries-old mystical battle in Chinatown.
187.Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: Kurt Russell, Kim Cattrall, Dennis Dun

188.Name: Shaolin Soccer
188.Outline: A young Shaolin follower reunites with his discouraged brothers to form a soccer team using their martial art skills to their advantage.
188.Credit: Dir: Stephen Chow With: Stephen Chow, Wei Zhao, Yat-Fei Wong

189.Name: Megamind
189.Outline: The supervillain Megamind finally defeats his nemesis, the superhero Metro Man. But without a hero, he loses all purpose and must find new meaning to his life.
189.Credit: Dir: Tom McGrath With: Will Ferrell, Jonah Hill, Brad Pitt

190.Name: Kung Fu Panda 2
190.Outline: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.
190.Credit: Dir: Jennifer Yuh Nelson With: Jack Black, Angelina Jolie, Jackie Chan

191.Name: Dr. No
191.Outline: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.
191.Credit: Dir: Terence Young With: Sean Connery, Ursula Andress, Bernard Lee

192.Name: The Gods Must Be Crazy
192.Outline: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.
192.Credit: Dir: Jamie Uys With: N!xau, Marius Weyers, Sandra Prinsloo

193.Name: Crimson Tide
193.Outline: On a US nuclear missile sub, a young first officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.
193.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Gene Hackman, Denzel Washington, Matt Craven

194.Name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
194.Outline: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.
194.Credit: Dir: Zack Snyder With: Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams

195.Name: The Negotiator
195.Outline: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.
195.Credit: Dir: F. Gary Gray With: Samuel L. Jackson, Kevin Spacey, David Morse

196.Name: Furious 7
196.Outline: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.
196.Credit: Dir: James Wan With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson

197.Name: Enemy of the State
197.Outline: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his NSA goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.
197.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight

198.Name: Face/Off
198.Outline: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a face-transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a ruthless terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same criminal impersonates the cop.
198.Credit: Dir: John Woo With: John Travolta, Nicolas Cage, Joan Allen

199.Name: Ronin
199.Outline: A freelancing former US intelligence agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by both the Irish and the Russians.
199.Credit: Dir: John Frankenheimer With: Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone

200.Name: Spider-Man
200.Outline: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.
200.Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe

201.Name: Friday Night Lights
201.Outline: Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.
201.Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Billy Bob Thornton, Jay Hernandez, Derek Luke

202.Name: Iron Man 3
202.Outline: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.
202.Credit: Dir: Shane Black With: Robert Downey Jr., Guy Pearce, Gwyneth Paltrow

203.Name: Willow
203.Outline: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.
203.Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Val Kilmer, Joanne Whalley, Warwick Davis

204.Name: King Kong
204.Outline: In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape who is immediately smitten with leading lady Ann Darrow.
204.Credit: Dir: Peter Jackson With: Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody

205.Name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
205.Outline: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.
205.Credit: Dir: Nicholas Meyer With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley

206.Name: Harry Brown

315.Outline: At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.
