316.Name: Breakdown
316.Outline: A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.
316.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Mostow With: Kurt Russell, J.T. Walsh, Kathleen Quinlan

317.Name: Chappie
317.Outline: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.
317.Credit: Dir: Neill Blomkamp With: Sharlto Copley, Dev Patel, Hugh Jackman

318.Name: Patriot Games
318.Outline: When CIA Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.
318.Credit: Dir: Phillip Noyce With: Harrison Ford, Sean Bean, Anne Archer

319.Name: All Is Lost
319.Outline: After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face.
319.Credit: Dir: J.C. Chandor With: Robert Redford

320.Name: A Knight's Tale
320.Outline: After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.
320.Credit: Dir: Brian Helgeland With: Heath Ledger, Mark Addy, Rufus Sewell

321.Name: Ice Age: The Meltdown
321.Outline: Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny, in fact, is not the last of the woolly mammoths.
321.Credit: Dir: Carlos Saldanha With: Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary
321.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy

322.Name: Unknown
322.Outline: A man awakens from a coma, only to discover that someone has taken on his identity and that no one, (not even his wife), believes him. With the help of a young woman, he sets out to prove who he is.
322.Credit: Dir: Jaume Collet-Serra With: Liam Neeson, Diane Kruger, January Jones

323.Name: Wild Target
323.Outline: A hitman tries to retire but a beautiful thief may change his plans.
323.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Lynn With: Bill Nighy, Emily Blunt, Rupert Grint

324.Name: Spectre
324.Outline: A cryptic message from Bond's past sends him on a trail to uncover a sinister organization. While M battles political forces to keep the secret service alive, Bond peels back the layers of deceit to reveal the terrible truth behind SPECTRE.
324.Credit: Dir: Sam Mendes With: Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, LÃ©a Seydoux

325.Name: Mission: Impossible III
325.Outline: Agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fianceÃ© in response .
325.Credit: Dir: J.J. Abrams With: Tom Cruise, Michelle Monaghan, Ving Rhames

326.Name: Enemy Mine
326.Outline: A soldier from Earth crash-lands on an alien world after sustaining battle damage. Eventually he encounters another survivor...
326.Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: Dennis Quaid, Louis Gossett Jr., Brion James

327.Name: Clash of the Titans
327.Outline: A film adaption of the myth of Perseus and his quest to battle both Medusa and the Kraken monster to save the Princess Andromeda.
327.Credit: Dir: Desmond Davis With: Laurence Olivier, Harry Hamlin, Claire Bloom

328.Name: Four Brothers
328.Outline: Four brothers look to avenge their mother's death.
328.Credit: Dir: John Singleton With: Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Garrett Hedlund

329.Name: The Island
329.Outline: Lincoln Six Echo is just like everyone else - he's waiting to go to the Island, the only place left in the world to actually live a life...
329.Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Scarlett Johansson, Ewan McGregor, Djimon Hounsou

330.Name: Smokey and the Bandit
330.Outline: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor trailer full of beer over county lines in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.
330.Credit: Dir: Hal Needham With: Burt Reynolds, Sally Field, Jerry Reed

331.Name: Top Gun
331.Outline: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.
331.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Tom Cruise, Tim Robbins, Kelly McGillis

332.Name: The Mask
332.Outline: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.
332.Credit: Dir: Chuck Russell With: Jim Carrey, Cameron Diaz, Peter Riegert

333.Name: National Treasure
333.Outline: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.
333.Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Justin Bartha

334.Name: The Book of Eli
334.Outline: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.
334.Credit: Dir: Albert Hughes, Allen Hughes With: Denzel Washington, Mila Kunis, Ray Stevenson

335.Name: Green Zone
335.Outline: Discovering covert and faulty intelligence causes a U.S. Army officer to go rogue as he hunts for Weapons of Mass Destruction in an unstable region.
335.Credit: Dir: Paul Greengrass With: Matt Damon, Jason Isaacs, Greg Kinnear

336.Name: Adventures in Babysitting
336.Outline: A babysitter must leave her safe suburban surroundings and head for the heart of the big city to rescue a stranded friend, unaware of the perilous adventures that await her and the kids she's looking after who have tagged along.
336.Credit: Dir: Chris Columbus With: Elisabeth Shue, Maia Brewton, Keith Coogan
336.Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Crime | Family | Romance | Thriller

337.Name: The Guardian
337.Outline: A high school swim champion with a troubled past enrolls in the U.S. Coast Guard's "A" School, where legendary rescue swimmer Ben Randall teaches him some hard lessons about loss, love, and self-sacrifice.
337.Credit: Dir: Andrew Davis With: Kevin Costner, Ashton Kutcher, Sela Ward

338.Name: Captain America: The First Avenger
338.Outline: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.
338.Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Chris Evans, Hugo Weaving, Samuel L. Jackson

339.Name: Logan's Run
339.Outline: An idyllic sci-fi future has one major drawback: life must end at the age of 30.
339.Credit: Dir: Michael Anderson With: Michael York, Jenny Agutter, Richard Jordan

340.Name: Hellboy
340.Outline: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.
340.Credit: Dir: Guillermo del Toro With: Ron Perlman, Doug Jones, Selma Blair

341.Name: The Incredible Hulk
341.Outline: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he emerges whenever he loses his temper. However, Banner then must fight a soldier whom unleashes himself as a threat stronger than he.
341.Credit: Dir: Louis Leterrier With: Edward Norton, Liv Tyler, Tim Roth

342.Name: Bad Boys
342.Outline: Two hip detectives protect a murder witness while investigating a case of stolen heroin.
342.Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Lisa Boyle

343.Name: Men in Black 3
343.Outline: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.
343.Credit: Dir: Barry Sonnenfeld With: Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Josh Brolin

344.Name: The Maze Runner
344.Outline: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they're all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow "runners" for a shot at escape.
344.Credit: Dir: Wes Ball With: Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario, Will Poulter

345.Name: Live and Let Die
345.Outline: 007 is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organization and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.
345.Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Roger Moore, Yaphet Kotto, Jane Seymour

346.Name: The Transporter
346.Outline: Frank is hired to "transport" packages for unknown clients and has made a very good living doing so. But when asked to move a package that begins moving, complications arise.
346.Credit: Dir: Louis Leterrier, Corey Yuen With: Jason Statham, Qi Shu, Matt Schulze

347.Name: Machine Gun Preacher
347.Outline: Sam Childers is a former drug-dealing biker tough guy who found God and became a crusader for hundreds of Sudanese children who've been forced to become soldiers.
347.Credit: Dir: Marc Forster With: Gerard Butler, Michelle Monaghan, Michael Shannon

348.Name: TRON
348.Outline: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.
348.Credit: Dir: Steven Lisberger With: Jeff Bridges, Bruce Boxleitner, David Warner

349.Name: Con Air
349.Outline: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.
349.Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich

350.Name: Young Guns
350.Outline: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.
350.Credit: Dir: Christopher Cain With: Emilio Estevez, Kiefer Sutherland, Lou Diamond Phillips

351.Name: Street Kings
351.Outline: An undercover cop, disillusioned by the recent murder of his wife, is implicated in the murder of an officer and must struggle to clear himself.
351.Credit: Dir: David Ayer With: Keanu Reeves, Forest Whitaker, Hugh Laurie

352.Name: Who Am I?
352.Outline: A secret agent loses his memory after falling from a crashing helicopter. He is then chased by a number of other agency operatives, but he has no idea why.
352.Credit: Dir: Benny Chan, Jackie Chan With: Jackie Chan, Michelle Ferre, Mirai Yamamoto

353.Name: Hanna
353.Outline: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.
353.Credit: Dir: Joe Wright With: Saoirse Ronan, Cate Blanchett, Eric Bana

354.Name: Death Sentence
354.Outline: Nick Hume is a mild-mannered executive with a perfect life, until one gruesome night he witnesses something that changes him forever. Transformed by grief, Hume eventually comes to the disturbing conclusion that no length is too great when protecting his family.
354.Credit: Dir: James Wan With: Kevin Bacon, John Goodman, Kelly Preston

355.Name: Heartbreak Ridge
355.Outline: A hard-nosed, hard-living Marine gunnery sergeant clashes with his superiors and his ex-wife as he takes command of a spoiled recon platoon with a bad attitude.
355.Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Marsha Mason, Everett McGill

356.Name: TRON: Legacy
356.Outline: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.
356.Credit: Dir: Joseph Kosinski With: Jeff Bridges, Garrett Hedlund, Olivia Wilde

357.Name: The A-Team
357.Outline: A group of Iraq War veterans looks to clear their name with the U.S. military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.
357.Credit: Dir: Joe Carnahan With: Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley

358.Name: Superman II
358.Outline: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.
358.Credit: Dir: Richard Lester With: Gene Hackman, Christopher Reeve, Margot Kidder

359.Name: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
359.Outline: A young adventurer named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.
359.Credit: Dir: Gary Trousdale, Kirk Wise With: Michael J. Fox, Jim Varney, Corey Burton
359.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi

360.Name: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
360.Outline: James Bond woos a mob boss's daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps that involves beautiful women from around the world.
360.Credit: Dir: Peter R. Hunt With: George Lazenby, Diana Rigg, Telly Savalas

361.Name: For Your Eyes Only
361.Outline: Agent 007 is assigned to hunt for a lost British encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.
361.Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Roger Moore, Carole Bouquet, Topol

362.Name: Bloodsport
362.Outline: Follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.
362.Credit: Dir: Newt Arnold With: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Donald Gibb, Leah Ayres

363.Name: Pandorum
363.Outline: A pair of crew members aboard a spaceship wake up with no knowledge of their mission or their identities.
363.Credit: Dir: Christian Alvart With: Dennis Quaid, Ben Foster, Cam Gigandet

364.Name: The Grey
364.Outline: After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step.
364.Credit: Dir: Joe Carnahan With: Liam Neeson, Dermot Mulroney, Frank Grillo

365.Name: The Man with the Golden Gun
365.Outline: James Bond is led to believe that he is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin while he attempts to recover sensitive solar cell technology that is being sold to the highest bidder.
365.Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Roger Moore, Christopher Lee, Britt Ekland

366.Name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
366.Outline: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.
366.Credit: Dir: Marc Webb With: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx

367.Name: X-Men: The Last Stand
367.Outline: When a cure is found to treat mutations, lines are drawn amongst the X-Men, led by Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a band of powerful mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.
367.Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry

368.Name: Safe House
368.Outline: A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.
368.Credit: Dir: Daniel Espinosa With: Denzel Washington, Ryan Reynolds, Robert Patrick

369.Name: Unstoppable
369.Outline: With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.
369.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Denzel Washington, Chris Pine, Rosario Dawson

370.Name: The Enforcer
370.Outline: Dirty Harry must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with a rookie female partner that he's not too excited to be working with.
370.Credit: Dir: James Fargo With: Clint Eastwood, Tyne Daly, Harry Guardino

371.Name: No Escape
371.Outline: In their new overseas home, an American family soon finds themselves caught in the middle of a coup, and they frantically look for a safe escape from an environment where foreigners are being immediately executed.
371.Credit: Dir: John Erick Dowdle With: Lake Bell, Pierce Brosnan, Owen Wilson

372.Name: Underworld: Evolution
372.Outline: Picking up directly from the previous film, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.
372.Credit: Dir: Len Wiseman With: Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman, Bill Nighy

373.Name: Gangster Squad
373.Outline: It's 1949 Los Angeles, the city is run by gangsters and a malicious mobster, Mickey Cohen. Determined to end the corruption, John O'Mara assembles a team of cops, ready to take down the ruthless leader and restore peace to the city.
373.Credit: Dir: Ruben Fleischer With: Sean Penn, Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone

374.Name: Escape Plan
374.Outline: When a structural-security authority finds himself set up and incarcerated in the world's most secret and secure prison, he has to use his skills to escape with help from the inside.
374.Credit: Dir: Mikael HÃ¥fstrÃ¶m With: Sylvester Stallone, Arnold Schwarzenegger, 50 Cent

375.Name: 2 Guns
375.Outline: Two hardened criminals get into trouble with the US border patrol after meeting with a Mexican drug lord, and then revelations start to unfold.
375.Credit: Dir: Baltasar KormÃ¡kur With: Denzel Washington, Mark Wahlberg, Paula Patton

376.Name: Redirected
376.Outline: Three friends try to make money and invite another friend in on a plot.
376.Credit: Dir: Emilis Velyvis With: Vinnie Jones, Scot Williams, Gil Darnell

377.Name: Innerspace
377.Outline: A hapless store clerk must foil criminals to save the life of the man who, miniaturized in a secret experiment, was accidentally injected into him.
377.Credit: Dir: Joe Dante With: Dennis Quaid, Martin Short, Meg Ryan
377.Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller

378.Name: The Long Kiss Goodnight
378.Outline: A woman suffering from amnesia begins to recover her memories after trouble from her past finds her again.
378.Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Geena Davis, Samuel L. Jackson, Yvonne Zima

379.Name: The Way of the Gun
379.Outline: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.
379.Credit: Dir: Christopher McQuarrie With: Ryan Phillippe, Benicio Del Toro, Juliette Lewis

380.Name: Shoot 'Em Up
380.Outline: A man named Mr. Smith delivers a woman's baby during a shootout, and is then called upon to protect the newborn from the army of gunmen.
380.Credit: Dir: Michael Davis With: Clive Owen, Monica Bellucci, Paul Giamatti

381.Name: The Mask of Zorro
381.Outline: A young thief, seeking revenge over the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who is also seeking a vengeance of his own.
381.Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Antonio Banderas, Anthony Hopkins, Catherine Zeta-Jones
381.Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Romance | Thriller | Western

382.Name: Rumble in the Bronx
382.Outline: A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.
382.Credit: Dir: Stanley Tong With: Jackie Chan, Anita Mui, FranÃ§oise Yip

383.Name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
383.Outline: A group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect New York City from an uprising criminal gang of ninjas.
383.Credit: Dir: Steve Barron With: Judith Hoag, Elias Koteas, Josh Pais

384.Name: The Matrix Revolutions
384.Outline: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.
384.Credit: Dir: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski With: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

385.Name: The Wolverine
385.Outline: When Wolverine is summoned to Japan by an old acquaintance, he is embroiled in a conflict that forces him to confront his own demons.
385.Credit: Dir: James Mangold With: Hugh Jackman, Will Yun Lee, Tao Okamoto

386.Name: Backdraft
386.Outline: Two Chicago firefighter brothers who don't get along have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.
386.Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Kurt Russell, William Baldwin, Robert De Niro

387.Name: Hot Shots!
387.Outline: A parody of Top Gun in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers.
387.Credit: Dir: Jim Abrahams With: Charlie Sheen, Cary Elwes, Valeria Golino

388.Name: Resident Evil
388.Outline: A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.
388.Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Milla Jovovich, Michelle Rodriguez, Ryan McCluskey

389.Name: Nothing to Lose
389.Outline: Nick Beam's life couldn't get any worse. He discovers he has been living a lie and is on the verge of a nervous breakdown...
389.Credit: Dir: Steve Oedekerk With: Martin Lawrence, Tim Robbins, John C. McGinley

390.Name: Wanted
390.Outline: A frustrated office worker learns that he is the son of a professional assassin, and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.
390.Credit: Dir: Timur Bekmambetov With: Angelina Jolie, James McAvoy, Morgan Freeman

391.Name: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
391.Outline: The animals try to fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African wildlife refuge, where Alex is reunited with his parents.
391.Credit: Dir: Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath With: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer

392.Name: The Living Daylights
392.Outline: James Bond is living on the edge to stop an evil arms dealer from starting another world war. Bond crosses all seven continents in order to stop the evil Whitaker and General Koskov.
392.Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Timothy Dalton, Maryam d'Abo, Jeroen KrabbÃ©

393.Name: The Last Starfighter
393.Outline: A discouraged video-gaming boy finds himself recruited as a gunner for an alien defense force.
393.Credit: Dir: Nick Castle With: Lance Guest, Robert Preston, Kay E. Kuter

394.Name: The Rundown
394.Outline: A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.
394.Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Christopher Walken

395.Name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
395.Outline: A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Team X and the impact it will have on his later years.
395.Credit: Dir: Gavin Hood With: Hugh Jackman, Liev Schreiber, Ryan Reynolds

396.Name: Conspiracy Theory
396.Outline: A man obsessed with conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of his theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, in order to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.
396.Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Julia Roberts, Patrick Stewart

397.Name: Lethal Weapon 3
397.Outline: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue an arms dealer who is a former LAPD officer.
397.Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci

398.Name: The Fast and the Furious
398.Outline: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Connor must decide where his loyalties really lie when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.
398.Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez

399.Name: Absolute Power
399.Outline: A career thief witnesses a horrific crime involving the U.S. President.
399.Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Ed Harris

400.Name: Smokin' Aces
400.Outline: When a Las Vegas performer-turned-snitch named Buddy Israel decides to turn state's evidence and testify against the mob, it seems that a whole lot of people would like to make sure he's no longer breathing.
400.Credit: Dir: Joe Carnahan With: Jeremy Piven, Ryan Reynolds, Ray Liotta

401.Name: The Bourne Legacy
401.Outline: An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.
401.Credit: Dir: Tony Gilroy With: Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz, Edward Norton

402.Name: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
402.Outline: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with PadmÃ©, while Obi-Wan investigates an assassination attempt on the Senator and discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.
402.Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman, Ewan McGregor

403.Name: Ender's Game
403.Outline: Young Ender Wiggin is recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, a genocidal alien race which nearly annihilated the human race in a previous invasion.
403.Credit: Dir: Gavin Hood With: Harrison Ford, Asa Butterfield, Hailee Steinfeld

404.Name: The Chronicles of Riddick
404.Outline: The wanted criminal Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.
404.Credit: Dir: David Twohy With: Vin Diesel, Judi Dench, Colm Feore

405.Name: Commando
405.Outline: A retired elite Black Ops Commando launches a one man war against a group of South American criminals who have kidnapped his daughter to blackmail him into starting a revolution and getting an exiled dictator back into power.
405.Credit: Dir: Mark L. Lester With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Rae Dawn Chong, Dan Hedaya

406.Name: Diamonds Are Forever
406.Outline: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.
406.Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Sean Connery, Jill St. John, Charles Gray

407.Name: Puss in Boots
407.Outline: The events leading up to the sword fighting cat's meeting with Shrek and his friends.
407.Credit: Dir: Chris Miller With: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Zach Galifianakis
407.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy

408.Name: Robin Hood
408.Outline: In 12th century England, Robin and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.
408.Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Russell Crowe, Cate Blanchett, Matthew Macfadyen

409.Name: In Time
409.Outline: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.
409.Credit: Dir: Andrew Niccol With: Justin Timberlake, Amanda Seyfried, Cillian Murphy

410.Name: Machete
410.Outline: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.
410.Credit: Dir: Ethan Maniquis, Robert Rodriguez With: Danny Trejo, Michelle Rodriguez, Robert De Niro

411.Name: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
411.Outline: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.
411.Credit: Dir: Rob Marshall With: Johnny Depp, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Ian McShane

412.Name: The Expendables 2
412.Outline: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.
412.Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Sylvester Stallone, Liam Hemsworth, Randy Couture

413.Name: Blade II
413.Outline: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reaper vampires who feed on vampires.
413.Credit: Dir: Guillermo del Toro With: Wesley Snipes, Kris Kristofferson, Ron Perlman

414.Name: RED 2
414.Outline: Retired C.I.A. agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.
414.Credit: Dir: Dean Parisot With: Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren, John Malkovich

415.Name: Quantum of Solace
415.Outline: James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organization from eliminating a country's most valuable resource. All the while, he still tries to seek revenge over the death of his love.
415.Credit: Dir: Marc Forster With: Daniel Craig, Olga Kurylenko, Mathieu Amalric

416.Name: Hidalgo
416.Outline: In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.
416.Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Viggo Mortensen, Omar Sharif, Zuleikha Robinson

417.Name: The Other Guys
417.Outline: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops whom they idolize -- only things don't quite go as planned.
417.Credit: Dir: Adam McKay With: Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Derek Jeter

418.Name: Fast & Furious
418.Outline: Brian O'Conner, now working for the FBI in LA, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.
418.Credit: Dir: Justin Lin With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez

419.Name: Elysium
419.Outline: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.
419.Credit: Dir: Neill Blomkamp With: Matt Damon, Jodie Foster, Sharlto Copley

420.Name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
420.Outline: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.
420.Credit: Dir: Leonard Nimoy With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley

421.Name: The Running Man
421.Outline: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

422.Name: Black Rain
422.Outline: Two NYC cops arrest a Yakuza member and must escort him when he's extradited to Japan.

423.Name: Terminator Salvation
423.Outline: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

424.Name: Wasabi
424.Outline: Hubert is a French policeman with very sharp methods. After being forced to take 2 months off by his boss...

425.Name: The Heat
425.Outline: An uptight FBI Special Agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop to take down a ruthless drug lord.

426.Name: Sudden Impact
426.Outline: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.
426.Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Sondra Locke, Pat Hingle

427.Name: Kick-Ass 2
427.Outline: Following Kick-Ass's heroics, other citizens are inspired to become masked crusaders. But the Red Mist leads his own group of evil super-villains to kill Kick-Ass and destroy everything for which he stands.

429.Name: Attack the Block

430.Name: Man on a Ledge

431.Name: Tears of the Sun
431.Outline: A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the Nigerian jungle in order to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.

432.Name: Vantage Point
432.Outline: The attempted assassination of the American President is told and re-told from several different perspectives.

434.Name: Lethal Weapon 4

435.Name: Armageddon

438.Name: Eagle Eye
438.Outline: Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a mysterious phone call from a woman they have never met. Threatening their lives and family, she pushes Jerry and Rachel into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, using the technology of everyday life to track and control their every move.

440.Name: Kiss of the Dragon

442.Name: Christine

443.Name: Spartan

460.Name: The 13th Warrior

461.Name: The Mechanic

480.Name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace

481.Name: Act of Valor

483.Name: Basic

484.Name: Ladder 49

485.Name: Dead Man Down

489.Name: The Lone Ranger

490.Name: The Lost World: Jurassic Park

491.Name: U.S. Marshals

492.Name: Faster

493.Name: Tomorrowland

494.Name: The Expendables

495.Name: From Paris with Love

496.Name: Godzilla

497.Name: Revolver

498.Name: Gone in Sixty Seconds

499.Name: Snitch

499.Credit: Dir: Ric Roman Waugh With: Dwayne Johnson, Susan Sarandon, Jon Bernthal

500.Name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith

500.Credit: Dir: Doug Liman With: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Adam Brody
